comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; de; rv:1.9.2.16) Gecko/20110319 Firefox/3.6.16
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; de; rv:1.9.2.15) Gecko/20110303 Lightning/1.0b2 Thunderbird/3.1.9 ThunderBrowse/3.3.5

I wanted to import all adresses from a nokia mobile phone (Nokia 6131) to thunderbird. The Nokia Software is supporting Outlook but not Thunderbird so i had to save all to an *.csv file(comma separated value file).

Because the entries of the csv and how thunderbird expects it are not fitting i exportet thunderbird adressbook to an other csv and made then the nokia csv fitting to this template.

But when i try to import this csv thunderbird doesnt understand its own template and gives me this preview (see picture 1 and 2)

In Libre Office (OpenOffice) Calc everything looks good (see picture 3)



Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open Example csv file ( Testdata01_made_with_calc_libre_office.csv )
2. Look messed up preview
3.
Actual Results:  
Messed up adresses.

Expected Results:  
Should import all adresses easy and fine from Nokia Mobiel Phones
comments.creator: atlanx@focx.de

comments.text:
Created attachment 525976
This is the csv Address Book Data i want to import (example file)

File contains no private data. All real data exchanged by random
comments.author: atlanx@focx.de
